name: Avoid undocumented Sections (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the undocumented Sections.
output:
"This report lists all undocumented Sections.

This QR provides the following information:
Section full name."
rationale: Code maintainability can be improved if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure that comments exist in the Section.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of undocumented Sections.
